name: kint
description: Kint - debugging helper for PHP developers

scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:sass && npm run build:js
scripts.build:js: find resources/js/ -name '*.js' | while read f; do uglifyjs "$f" -cmv --lint > "resources/compiled/${f#resources/js/}" || exit 1; done
scripts.format: npm run format:php && npm run format:js && npm run format:sass
scripts.format:php: composer exec php-cs-fixer fix || composer.phar exec php-cs-fixer fix
scripts.format:js: find resources/js/ -name '*.js' | while read f; do js-beautify -nr "$f" || exit 1; done
